content: Net income for the second quarter 2022 was $3.8 million or $0.33 per diluted share compared to net income of $6.5 million or $0.57 per diluted share in the second quarter of 2021 for decreases of 42.3% and 42.1%, respectively. Net income for the first half of 2022 was $5.8 million or $0.51 per diluted share compared to net income for the first half of 2021 of $9.7 million or $0.85 per diluted share, decreases of 39.9% and 40%, respectively.
